spatial_accuracy.notes: Severe layout distortion. The L-shaped living/dining core is broken; the kitchen has been relocated and duplicated. Window and door placements do not match the source plan (e.g., missing balcony access, incorrect bedroom window placement).

structural_fidelity.notes: Walls are present and roof is removed, but the internal structural logic is reinterpreted with hallucinated partitions. The separate Garage unit is missing entirely.

furniture_mapping.notes: Block furniture is used, but placement is random and does not follow the functional zones of the plan (e.g., dining tables placed in bedrooms/hallways).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Good adherence to low-poly, flat-shaded style on a neutral background. Isometric perspective is maintained, though lighting is slightly murky rather than clean flat colors.

detected_errors.description: Missing Garage unit and balcony outdoor area.
Major layout distortion; kitchen shifted and living room proportions lost.
Hallucinated multiple dining tables and shifted internal partitions.
Incorrect door orientation and window count on exterior walls.
